definition: an involuntary intake of breath through a wide open mouth, utter a yawn, as from lack of oxygen or when one is tired
details:
noun
- an involuntary intake of breath through a wide open mouth
= synonyms: oscitance, oscitancy, yawning
verb
- utter a yawn, as from lack of oxygen or when one is tired
= example: utter a yawn, as from lack of oxygen or when one is tired
- be wide open
= synonyms: gape, yaw
